TopicTitle: Is there a setting that makes ships invincible?

Articles.Content: I'm trying to test out different airplane designs and it would make things easier if there was a setting that prevented the airplane from disintegrating due to high aerodynamic forces. I tried pressing ALT-F12 and selecting "Unbreakable Joints" and "No Crash Damage" but my plane still breaks up if the aero forces are great enough.
There are currently no ways to make a ship invincible in stock. Maybe there is a mod out there, but I don't know.
Are they really breaking from aero forces or overheating?  There's an option in there somewhere to adjust heating.
